tablescraper-selected-row: To use the  board, you will need the Arduino AVR Board Package, which comes pre-installed with the IDE.
You will need a version of the Arduino IDE, which you can download from the . In this guide, we will use the latest version of the IDE 2.
You can also use the  which comes with all Arduino boards pre-installed.
First, we need to download the Arduino IDE, which can be done from the .

The  comes pre-installed with the IDE, so no additional installation is necessary to get started. To use a different version than the latest, open the "Board Manager" from the left-hand menu. Search for AVR and install the version you want to use.
You should now be able to select your board in the board selector. You will need to have your board connected to your computer via the USB-B connector at this point.
Congratulations, your board is now ready to be used via the Arduino IDE.
